unnormalised: Borem, konnen tori quadratic equations sodovnache vixim vicharlem? Yahan pe, sogllem 'x' sodun kaddpache vixim asa, barabor? Tem ek puzzle-antle missing piece sodun kaddta tenem chint. Samanyponnan, tum ax^2 + bx + c = 0 oxem kitem tori polloat. Ti standard form.
normalised: Boro, konnain trikonmiti somikoronam sodoychea vixim vicharlem? Hangasor, 'x' kaddpachem asa, borobor? Tujea dolleant doryeacho tukdo sodunk mellta tech bhaxen chint. Samanyponnan, tuka a x squared plus b x plus c barabor zero asolem dixtti poddtolem. Tem standard roop.

unnormalised: Atam, te foddpache kaim mukhel marg asat. Poilem, factorization. Jem numbr bore ani nett'ttki astana chodd bore poddta. Jemna tum x^2 + 5x + 6 = 0 asta, tum tem (x+2)(x+3) = 0 hanthun vibhagit korunk xakta. Mhunnlear, x -2 vo -3 zatlo. Easy peasy, lemon squeezy!
normalised: Atam, he sodoycheak kilka mukhia margam asa. Poilem, fatorokaran. Tem khorim nomber boro ani susheel aslear baraak poddtta. Zoxem, tuje lagim x squared plus panch x plus so barabor zero asa, tum tem parenthesis x plus don parenthesis parenthesis x plus teen parenthesis barabor zero mhunn vanttun uddounk sakta. Mhunnche, x minus don vo minus teen zatolem. Sopo sopo, limbo chimtto!

unnormalised: Pun factorization mathedukhi zalear kitem? Thoi quadratic formula ieita. Tem thodem avghodd dista, pun mhojem aik, tumcho ut'tom ixtt to. Tem oxem cholta: x = [-b ± sqrt(b^2 - 4ac)] / 2a. Ugddas dovrat '±' signacho orth tumka don zobabo mellttat - ek plus ani ek minus-aso. Mhunnlear, tumka 2x^2 + 3x - 5 = 0 oxem equation astana, tum फक्त a=2, b=3, ani c=-5 formula-nt ghal ani boom – tumka tumcho zobab melltta. Tum निश्चयच tumchea calculator-an tem check korunk xakta.
normalised: Pun fattorokaran dukhi zalear kitem? Thoy trikonmiti formul dixtti poddtta. Tem thoddem avogodda aslear, mhojer visvas dovor, tem tuzo boreasto ixtt. Tem oxem voita: x barabor bracket minus b plus vo minus square root of parenthesis b squared minus char a c parenthesis bracket divided by don a. Ugddas dovor te plus vo minus sign tuka don zobab melltoy - ek plus ani dusro minus kodden. Mhunnche, tuje lagim don x squared plus teen x minus panch barabor zero oxem somikoron asa, tum fokot a barabor don, b barabor teen, ani c barabor minus panch formulant ghal ani boom - tuka tuzo zobab mell’lla. Tum tem tuzchea kelkuleetorant tharayeekponnan check korunk sakta.

unnormalised: Ani completing the square mhunn-num asa. Yeh thoda sa tricky hai, pun tem zannun ghevpak faideaachem asa. Bhov korun, tum ek perfect square trinomial toyar korpak equation-ak vaportat. Let’s say tumka x^2 + 6x + 2 = 0 asa. Tum (6/2)^2 zaka 9 zata to add ani subtract kortat. Uprant tum tem (x+3)^2 -7 = 0 mhunn porot boraitat, zachem mhonnje x = -3 ± sqrt(7).
normalised: Ani square porim korpachem asa. Tem thoddem aukhandik, pun tem zanna zai. Mulbhootponnan, tum ek purai square trinomial toiar korcheak somikoron manipulet korunk asa. Manun gheuyam tuka x squared plus so x plus don barabor zero asa. Tum zodd ani uddov parenthesis so divided by don parenthesis squared zo no. Magir tum tem parenthesis x plus teen parenthesis squared minus sat barabor zero mhunn porthun baray, mhunnche x barabor minus teen plus vo minus square root of sat.

unnormalised: Atam, discriminant, b^2 - 4ac, quadratic formula-antle, thode khas asat. If b^2 - 4ac > 0 asa, tumka 2 real solutions asat. If b^2 - 4ac = 0 asa, tumka 1 real solution melltta (vo, ami don ek sarke solutions mhunn sangtat). Ani if b^2 - 4ac < 0 asa, zalear vostu rasponn zatat – tumka 2 complex vo imaginary solutions asat. Tem ek equation sodovna-chenastana tumka roots-anchem swaroop sangta, गणितच्या खातीर astrology sarkhem!
normalised: Atam, discriminant, b squared minus char a c, trikonmiti formularantlean, thoddem speshal asa. B squared minus char a c zeroponam vhodd zalear, tuka don sat asole zobab asata. B squared minus char a c zerok barabor zalear, tuka ek sat zobab mellta (vo ammi don saman zobab mhunntat). Ani b squared minus char a c zeroponam lhan zalear, magir vostu rasponam asata - tuka don complex vo imaginary zobab asata. Tem mull roopachea suvabavo sangta, ani somikoron sodounchena, ganitacho jyotish bhaxen!

unnormalised: Ani ugddas dovrat, quadratic equations हरकडेन disun yetat. Physics-ant, tum ફેંકપૂचे त्या धोंड्याचे trajectory calculate korpak. Engineering-ant, to parabola पुल બાંધવો korpak. Dekhun heachincher प्रभुत्व मेळोवप खूब म्हत्वाचे. tem चाय कश्यो करप जाणून घेतल्यासारखें आसा – तुमकां तें चड वापरून जाता.
normalised: Ani ugddas dovor, trikonmiti somikoranam sogllekodden dixtti poddtta. Bhoutik shastrant, fikon kelolea fatrachea dishechi ganna korcheak. Engineering-an, te parabola pol bandunk. Mhunnche hem vostavpachem khup mhotvachem asa. Tem koso chaii yogya ritin korcho tem zanna aslear bhaxen chint - tum chintleponam vhoddponam kamak yeta!

unnormalised: Tumka कसलींच विशिष्ट समीकरण तुमकां त्रासांक पळयतात जाल्यार, तांकां पोस्ट करात. हांव तांकां step-by-step फोडपाक प्रयत्न करतलों. Happy solving! Aur haan, tumchea zobaboank double-check korpak visoronk naka. Chuk bhogta, सर्वश्रेष्ठ लोकांकूय, खास करून जेन्ना खूब गणित आनी square roots चलतात! फक्त PEMDAS ugddas dovrat ani goodluck.
normalised: Tuka spesifik somikoranam dukhi kortolem zalear, post kor. Ammi tem step-by-step vanttun uddouncheaak prayatn kortole. Kushalleponnan sodoy! Ani ohoi, tuje zobab double-check korcheak visronaka. Chuka zata, amche sarkhe boreak, khas korun thoim vhoddponam kelkuleet korpachem ani square roots voita thoim! Fokka P-E-M-D-A-S ugddas dovor ani borek poddos.
